metadata.title: CVE-2017-9841 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
Util/PHP/eval-stdin.php in PHPUnit before 4.8.28 and 5.x before 5.6.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via HTTP POST data beginning with a "<?php " substring, as demonstrated by an attack on a site with an exposed /vendor folder, i.e., external access to the /vendor/phpunit/phpunit/src/Util/PHP/eval-stdin.php URI.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-9841` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpunit - 6.5.5-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpunit package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.5-1ubuntu2').
